features.reservation_system: Complete reservation system with multilanguage support and advanced validation.
features.language_support: Full support for Spanish and English
features.auto_detection: Automatic browser language detection with localStorage persistence.
features.premium_locations: Premium studios and apartments in the best locations.

metadata.title: Node Properties - Premium Accommodation
metadata.description: Find your perfect home with Node Properties. Premium accommodation in the best locations with flexible stays.
metadata.keywords: accommodation, apartments, studios, reservations, node properties

form.title: Reservation Request
form.subtitle: Complete the required information for your reservation request

reservation.number_of_people: Number of tenants for the application
reservation.max_one_tenant: This unit only allows a maximum of 1 tenant.

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.subtitle: Enter the personal information required for your application

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.subtitle: Attach the required documents for your application
documents.dni_passport_description: Copy of your identity document. DNI only for Spanish citizens, others need to provide passport or NIE.
documents.dni_passport_guarantor_description: Guarantor's identity document. DNI only for Spanish citizens, others need to provide passport or NIE.
documents.employment_contract_description: Employment contract with minimum 3-4 months seniority.
documents.employment_contract_guarantor_descriptio: Guarantor's employment contract with minimum 1 year seniority.
documents.income_declaration: Income Tax Return (IRPF) or Income Tax Return
documents.freelance_receipt: Self-employed Fee Receipt or Freelance Status Proof

pricing.from_price_disclaimer: This is an estimated "starting from..." price. Final price and availability will be confirmed by the leasing team.

employment.sufficient_income_description: You need to demonstrate income of at least 3 times the monthly accommodation price.
employment.minimum_income_required: Minimum monthly income required of at least
employment.worker_type: Are you an employee or self-employed?
employment.self_employed_type: Are you EU or non-EU self-employed?
employment.continue_options_message: You can continue with your application by choosing one of the following options:
employment.guarantor_requirements: Present a guarantor with income â‰¥ 2.5 Ã— net rent and permanent contract > 1 year.
employment.advance_payment_description: Make advance payment for the stay according to available options.
employment.advance_payment_required: Advance payment required according to available options.
employment.joint_income_evaluation: Income is evaluated jointly between the two people
employment.income_example: For example: If the rent requires â‚¬2,000 monthly income, it can be â‚¬1,000 per person or any combination that adds up to the required total.

payment.payment_notice: Payment must be made once the application is confirmed.
payment.full_advance_description: Pay the entire stay in advance before check-in.
payment.six_months_plus_description: Pay the first 6 months in advance and the remainder in a single payment.
payment.six_months_plus_sixth_description: Pay the first 6 months (7 days before check-in) and the remainder in the 6th month.

alerts.minimum_duration_message: Standard Studio with Half Board requires a minimum stay of 9 months.
alerts.availability_message: The selected combination of unit, dates and stay type is not available or pricing could not be calculated. Please adjust your selection.
alerts.file_errors_message: There are errors in the attached files. Please review the files and correct the errors before submitting.
alerts.submission_success_message: Your reservation request has been submitted successfully. We will contact you soon.
alerts.submission_error_message: There was an error submitting your request. Please try again.
alerts.short_stays_message: For stays of less than 1 month, you need to make your reservation directly through Expedia. We do not offer this type of booking from our website.

dates.first_select_dates: First select check-in and check-out dates to see available unit types.

documents_section.title: Required Documentation
documents_section.allowed_formats: Allowed formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, DOCX, TXT
documents_section.short_stay_message: For stays between 1 and 3 months, payment for the stay must be made in a single installment in advance once the application is confirmed.
documents_section.two_people_document_info: You can upload documents for both people in the same fields
documents_section.two_people_clarification: It's not necessary to separate documents by person.

final_section.title: Review and Submit
final_section.subtitle: Review your application details and submit for approval.
final_section.review_message: Please carefully review the information provided before submitting your application. Once submitted, our team will review it and contact you to confirm availability and next steps.

price_section.title: Price Estimation
price_section.disclaimer: This is an estimate. Final price and availability will be confirmed by the leasing team.
price_section.not_available_message: Could not calculate price for current selection. Please verify dates and unit type or try another combination.

submission.success_message: Your application has been sent to our team. You will receive a response by email within 24-48 hours.
submission.step_contact: We will contact you to finalize the process
submission.error_message: Please complete all required fields and ensure the information is correct.
